description:
Tappy Word Infinite is a fun and family-friendly educational word game!

The aim is to create as many words as possible (or the longest word possible) from the never-ending jumble of letters â€“ simply tap the letters to create a word, then hit the confirm button. If you get stuck, use the handy slo-mo feature!

The game features three playing modes to suit players of any age or skill level: get as many correct answers as possible in Endless Mode, add some temporal pressure in Timed Mode, or tackle increasingly challenging levels in Campaign Mode.

FEATURES:
- A fantastically fun educational word game!
- Three challenging playing modes to master!
- Slo-mo feature for extra help just when you need it!
- Intuitive touch-screen controls!
- Instantly accessible pick-up-and-play gameplay!
- Simple, elegant game board design!
- Bright and bubbly background tunes!
- Suitable for players of all ages!
name: Tappy Word Infinite
